chat_history.message:
Hello, my iPhone 13 has the above problem:
Since Tuesday, delivery dates are announced and not met. I can't get any info without registration (create account). Both myself and my employer are upset. Can you establish contact with UPS?

Thank you for your help,

Hi ecomobile,

customer as contact UPS but no infos about parcel can you contact ups please

Thanks for your help in keeping our shared customers happy!
Ricardo-Filipe Back Market customer Care

Dear ecomobile

Reply to our message 

Regards,
Ermelinda from the Back Care Team

Dear Backcare,

We have updated our logistics partner regarding this issue and await updates from them. In the meantime, please be patient.

Regards,
Xt

Dear ecomobile


Do you have any updates for us 


Regards,
Ermelinda from the Back Care Team

Dear Backcare,

We are opening an investigation. Kindly provide us with the handwritten CND with IMEI 356174414395932 included and pictures of the customer's IC.

Thank you.
Regards,
SY

Dear ecomobile

The customer has provided all documents

You have one working day to initiate the refund 

Regards,
Ermelinda from the Back Care Team

Dear Backcare,

Thank you for your assistance.

Regards,
JY

Hello ecomobile,

We would like to inform you that, in accordance with our Quality Charter, we have refunded 444,59 € to the customer for initiation of the carrier investigation.

Please consult your SSC for further questions.

Thank you.

Kind regards, 
Marco from Back Market
